answers.answer: Hello! I haven't personally dealt with it but my friend did! Her first she suffered really bad. Her second her doctor monitored her until the end and when her blood pressure went up they went ahead and did her csection. She carried much further her second child.

question: We are expecting our second child in June . With my first I was diognosed with preeclampsia at 32 weeks.  Has anyone had it with there first but not second ?
title: preeclampsia?
